Posts.Content: Ibrance has already made $1 billion (yes that's a billion) and it's expected to be Pfizer's biggest money-maker for awhile going forward. See https://www.fiercepharma.com/marketing/pfizer-s-fast-growing-ibr... I personally would prefer that they stopped spending the farm on TV advertising and reduced the price so more people could afford it. In Canada we don't allow pharmas to advertise directly to the consumer and we have regulated pricing on prescription drugs. Seems like a more sensible system to me. I don't need to see an Ibrance ad five times a day
Posts.Title: Commercials for Ibrance, etc.
